vuba.fourcc_to_string¶

vuba.fourcc_to_string(fourcc)[source]¶

Convert fourcc integer code into codec string.

Parameters

fourcc (int) – Fourcc integer code.

Returns

codec – Codec string corresponding to fourcc code.

Return type

str
